segments.text: I see the water overflowing and creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the woman doesn't notice it at all, she's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit concerned watching this happen, someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying that plate, like nothing's wrong, it's quite strange.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever going to look down and see the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring down the cabinets, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really tell her what's going on before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't slip and fall, that would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she's completely unaware of their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a little disaster unfold, and there's nothing I can do.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a sight, so much water and she's missing it all, it's almost unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR
